full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI TSOGS MCHOD PHUL BA'I CHO GA RGYAL CHEN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI TSOGS MCHOD PHUL BA'I RGYAL CHEN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BSGYUR BYED KYI LONGS GA KYU BA'I TSES BZANG NYIN SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SHAR MAR 'PHEL BA'O,, ,,)
